data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 3,819 believers in the state of Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo, Guyana
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo, Guyana. Please, stir the 3,819 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, we ask for 4 new simple churches in the state of Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo, Guyana. Place a simple church in every community of the 24,300 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,819 believers find a person of peace today among the 20,482 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Urdu people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please give your people in Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo, Guyana a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo, Guyana. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

location.name: Upper Takutu-Upper Essequibo
location.people_groups_list: Macushi, Pemon, Taulipang, Han Chinese, Hakka, Sarnami Hindi, Han Chinese, Cantonese
